name: Impaler Throwing Knife
description: Classical impaler throwing knife with wood handle and curved blade, is an inexpensive way to fend off your enemies. 26cm. A throwing dagger is an efficient weapon to have when you are caught off guard or when during battle your sword will not reach, throwing knives can be useful in a multitude of situations.

name: Kunai with Holder, Black
description: Si vous êtes un combattant de Grandeur Nature, alors vous apprécierez l'utilité de cette arme de jet. Gardez-le à vos côtés en attachant les lacets de l'étui à votre bras ou votre ceinture. D'un simple mouvement de poignet, ce Kunai atteindra toujours sa cible.

name: Shuriken with Holder, Brown
description: The Shuriken is the preferred throwing weapon for any ninja or would be assassin wishing to stay hidden while killing your prey. Secured in a rigid leather holder, it can be fixed to any baldric, belt or piece of armor. You’ll be a force to be reckon with in your next Larp, medieval or Renaissance event.

name: Kunai with Holder, Brown
description: Si vous êtes un combattant de Grandeur Nature, alors vous apprécierez l'utilité de cette arme de jet. Gardez-le à vos côtés en attachant les lacets de l'étui à votre bras ou votre ceinture. D'un simple mouvement de poignet, ce Kunai atteindra toujours sa cible.

name: Push Dagger with Holder, Black
description: This black leather holder will secure Foam Push Dagger in its place in any situation. Easy to conceal and carry it is a great weapon to own, especially for the would-be assassin. Use the leather ties to fix it to a belt, bracer or any piece of armor.

name: Woodsman Knife and Holder, Black
description: The Woodsman Knife with Black Leather Holder will keep you at the ready for any encounter. The holder can be easily fixed to your belt and armor using two sets of leather strings. The leather tie will keep the knife secured in the holder during your adventures.

name: Push Dagger with Holder, Brown
description: Made from natural leather with reinforced stitches on each side, this brown leather holder will keep your Foam Push Dagger in place at any Larp. It’s quite easy to put it back in place, once you finish killing the evil village mayor. But don’t push your luck with the guards.

name: Woodsman Knife and Holder, Brown
description: The Woodsman Knife and Brown Leather Holder will prove quite useful to you against any beast you encounter. The holder can be easily fixed to your belt and armor with two sets of leather strings. A leather strap will keep the knife safe in the holder while you explore the forest at your next Larp event.

name: Skinner Knife with Holder, Brown
description: Perfect for Hunters and Trappers, the Skinner Knife with Holder is more than a simple tool, it’s also a throwing weapon! With its proper leather holder, it is a must have for any ranger or rogue. The foam weapon can safely be hurled at opponents making you a hard target.

name: Thrust Knife with Holder, Brown
description: The Foam Thrust Knife with brown leather holder can easily be tied to your armor using the leather strings. while a leather strap will keep the knife secured in place. It will fit with any style of Larp character and is a weapon you can trust!

name: Skinner Knife with Holder, Black
description: The Skinner Knife with Black leather Holder is more than a simple rangers tool, it’s also a throwing weapon! The knife is secured safely using a leather strap as you make your way through the dense forest.

name: Shuriken wih Holder, Black
description: The ancient universe has never been so protected. This foam shuriken comes equipped with its very own leather carrying case thus allowing you to have a multitude of weapons at your ready. Use the leather ties to fix it to any baldric, belt or piece of armor.

name: Assassin Rebel Throwing Knifes
description: This set of three assassin throwing knives can easily fit with any style of larp character. Flexible and easy to hide, the foam throwing knifes are flat on one side making easy to fit under a bracer giving you the advantage of surprise. Highly detailed they are the perfect throwing weapons for any larper.

name: Holder with Dark Elven Knife, Black
description: When venturing into the underworld you will need protection The Drow are a devilish culture and assassinations are plentiful. That is why you will need to carry this foam dark elf knife and its leather holder on your adventures. Use one or many, tie them together or to your belt, either way your chances are slim and the dangers are plenty.

name: Holder with Elven Knife, Brown
description: Never in the realms of man has ever a fine foam knife emerged. This elegant curved foam knife is protected by a richly engraved brown leather scabbard made to contour the forms of its blade. This holder can be fastened to any belt or armor using the leather ties keeping it close by your side.

name: Holder with Tornado Shuriken, Black
description: As any Ninja or ancient warrior can attest, the Shuriken was a practical weapon used to fend off or attack unwilling opponents. This foam Tornado shuriken comes with a black leather carry case the secures the larp weapon firmly in place while in larp combat.

name: Holder with Tornado Shuriken, Brown
description: The foam tornado Shuriken is a useful concealed weapon used by the ninja or any type of assassin. This larp weapon comes with its very own brown leather carrying case that can be tied to any piece or armor or belt, making it a very useful weapon at any Larp.

name: Wildling Throwing Knife Set, Brown
description: Our wildling throwing knife set can be used by any savage race such as orcs, barbarians or woodland creatures such as fairies and pixies. Designed with a rustic appearance these foam knives are firmly secured in this leather holder and can be tied to any belt giving a little protection to your larp character

name: Rogue Throwing Knife Set, Black
description: Our black leather rogue knife holder comes with all three knives shown as part of a starter kit for adventurers. The foam weapons are easy and quick to draw, perfect for protection against surprise attacks. These coreless foam throwing knives are Larp Safe but your enemies should be very afraid.

name: Rogue Throwing Knife Set, Brown
description: The rogue knife set is a perfect adventures kit intended for any larp adventurer. This set comes with each of the knives shown and a handy leather carry case that can be attached to any belt. These foam throwing weapons are an easy way to defend or protect yourself as you venture into the unknown.

name: Cutthroat Knife with Holder, Black
description: The Foam Cutthroat Knife comes with his own holder and can be fixed to your armor or your belt with leather strings. You can use the knife to assassinate and threaten your enemies at your next Larp event. A leather strap will help keep the knife in place while you run or jump.

name: Thrust Knife with Holder, Black
description: The Foam Thrust Knife with Holder can easily be fixed to your armor with the sets of leather strings while a leather strap will keep it in place. It can also fit with any kind of Larp character and will become an item you can trust!

name: Assassin Unity Throwing Knives
description: Our set of 3 Assassin Unity throwing knives can be the difference between life and death during a larp. When you use our foam larp throwing knives you do so in total security. They are not only safe to be thrown but they are pretty accurate, a necessity if you are an assassin. Length: 13cm

name: Assassin Inquisitor Throwing Knifes
description: This set of 3 foam throwing knives are easy to conceal beneath a bracer and are easily hidden on your larp characters body. Made from soft foam these highly detailed larp knives can safely be hurled at any opponent over great distances. Length: 13cm

name: Assassin Liberty Throwing Knives
description: The assassin liberty knives are a great addition to any rogue’s arsenal. This awesome set of 3 foam knifes can be used safely at any larp and can be thrown accurately at great distances. Be the first to draw your weapon, they will never know what hit them! Length: 13cm

name: Bone Skull, 9cm
description: Evil head hunters will enjoy our new PU foam Skulls. Necromancers can also use these skulls, made from injected foam, which can be hurled safely at your enemies.

name: Kunai , 19cm
description: Our new PU foam Kunai is made from soft foam with a realistic metallic finish. Lighter and more rigid than our competition it is easy to wield and can be hurled safely at your opponents. Length: 19cm

name: Beermug, 20cm
description: Huge latex beer mug with metal bands can be flung around safely during any tavern fight. We would suggest that you should avoid drinking directly from this mug although it is lead free. 20cm

name: Rolling Pin, 40cm
description: The classic latex rolling pin is made for those who wish to enter the kitchen uninvited or to fend off rodents and orcs. 40cm. This natural wood grain rolling pin can be hurled safely at opponents due to its flexible foam core.

name: Franciscan Throwing Axe, 25cm
description: The Franciscan latex axe is useful defense throwing weapon capable of being hurled at some distance. 25cm. The best part of this small throwing ax is the design. Everything is offset and slanted indicating its readiness to be thrown at your enemy at any given moment with ease.

name: Latex Throwing Bootknife
description: The Latex Boot Knife is a Larp safe throwing knife with wood handle and curved blade. It is an inexpensive way to fend off your enemies.  A throwing dagger is an efficient weapon to have when you are caught off guard or when during battle your sword will not reach. 26cm

name: Orc Throwing Dagger, 25cm
description: Orc coreless latex throwing knife is made from soft foam and intended hurled safely at your opponents. 26cm. The rugged almost carved steel blade with the rough green handle is an ugly addition to any orc costume.

name: Hunter Throwing Knife, 24cm
description: Classical throwing hunter knife with wood handle and curved blade, is an inexpensive way to kill your enemies. 26cm. A throwing dagger is an efficient weapon to have when you are caught off guard or when during battle your sword will not reach, throwing knives can be useful in a multitude of situations.

name: Throwing Knife Leather, 24cm
description: Classical throwing dagger with leather handle, are an inexpensive way to protect yourself. 24cm. A throwing dagger is an efficient weapon to have when you are caught off guard or when during battle your sword will not reach, throwing knives can be useful in a multitude of situations.

name: Shuriken, 12cm
description: Assassins will enjoy our new PU foam Shuriken. Made from soft injected foam it comes in a black metal finish. Lighter and more rigid than our competition it is easy to wield and can be hurled safely at your opponents. Length: 11.5cm

name: Steel Skull, 9cm
description: Evil head hunters will enjoy our new PU foam Skull. Necromancers can also use these skulls, made from injected foam, which can be hurled safely at your enemies.

name: Dark Elven Knife, 21cn
description: This oddly shaped foam throwing knife serves only one purpose, death! This unique curved larp blade can cut through flesh and is easily concealed due to its length. There is nothing good that ever came out of a Drow, except maybe this coreless foam dagger. Length:

name: Skinner Foam Knife
description: The skinner knife has many uses but was designed to strip off a piece of your victim with you once you have killed or captured him. The two toned curved blade coupled with the leather wrapped handle makes this coreless weapon safe to throw and is easy to conceal due to its size. Length: 15cm

name: Cutthroat Foam Knife
description: This Dwarven inspired larp blade is as sharp to look at as it is deadly. The unique angular shape makes this foam throwing knife an assassins friend. Because it is coreless, a murderous fiend can easily hide it on his person thus limiting the chance of detection. Length: 21cm

name: Elven Knife, 23cm
description: This simple Elven Throwing Knife is a perfectly safe weapon for any hunter or assassin to own. Do not let the elven features fool you, the carved wood handle and curved blade can be used with deadly force.

name: Foam Thrust Knife
description: This simple dual edged foam knife has only one simple purpose…death.  Designed for thrust, this coreless weapon can safely be thrown or used on opponent in a series of repeated attacks. Its tradition design is evidence to its usefulness in battle. Length: 20cm

name: Tornado Foam Shuriken
description: The shuriken is known throughout history as the weapon of the Ninja. But few realise how efficient this coreless weapon is until they are killed by it.  These soft foam weapons can be carried in a purse or pouch or easily be concealed in a belt. Diameter:10cm

name: Foam Push Dagger
description: This very compact coreless foam dagger fits comfortably in your hands and was intended for quick repeated jabs to the body of your enemy. Made from a soft durable foam it can be hidden in plain sight with only the blade protruding from between your fingers. Length: 10cm

name: Stone Foam Knife
description: This rough carved foam stone knife has a simple leather laced grip to accentuate an otherwise simple beastly foam weapon. Those playing more simplistic, untamed or animalistic characters will appreciate what this brutal coreless stone dagger can bring to the game. Length: 19.5cm

name: Woodsman Foam Knife
description: This foam larp knife is a perfect companion for any warrior. This traditional style coreless knife has a curved fingered wood grip accentuated by brass fixture with steel blade. When survival is a way of life this is the blade to carry.  Stay safe and secure and look good doing it.

name: Bone Foam Knife
description: Carved from animal remains, this deadly Bone foam knife features a simple simulated leather wrapped grip. Any savage warrior can appreciate how useful a concealed weapon can be, especially this coreless foam knife. Length: 21.5cm

name: 3 Hole Throwing Knife, 24cm
description: Classical throwing dagger with three holes in the handle, are an inexpensive way to defend yourself. 24cm. An efficient weapon to have when you are caught off guard or when during battle your sword will not reach, throwing knives can be useful in a multitude of situations.
